backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing accessâ€‘controlled storage for user profiles, daily orders, karigar mappings, and assignment records.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, related files, components, and test IDs for recent updates.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of major frontend files and features.
frontend/ic-assets.json5: IC asset configuration defining cache rules for index.html and all other static files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables defining light/dark design tokens and global styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document loading SheetJS and bootstrapping the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component providing header, navigation, and tab switching for the three app sections.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity with loading states and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Placeholder or empty component file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/features/daily-orders/compo: Dialog that assigns selected orders to a karigar and optional factory using a mutation hook.
Exports all orders for a selected factory to HTML using exportFactoryHtml, with loading state.
Groups factory orders by karigar, supports filtering, and exports per-karigar PDFs.
Factory list sidebar that allows selecting a factory and shows order counts.
Displays orders with assignment info, generic name lookup, and row selection controls.
Provides search input and sort toggle for orders list.
frontend/src/features/daily-orders/Daily: Main page for viewing, uploading, filtering, sorting, and saving daily orders, with Excel parsing and diagnostics.
frontend/src/features/daily-orders/excel: Parses Excel/CSV daily order files with header detection, alias matching, warnings, and cell normalization.
Parses karigar mapping files (Excel or PDF), detects headers, extracts design-to-karigar mappings, and normalizes design codes.
frontend/src/features/daily-orders/expor: Exports parsed daily orders to an Excel file, including optional karigar and generic name fields.
frontend/src/features/daily-orders/hooks: Provides search and sorting logic for filtering daily orders by text and design.
frontend/src/features/daily-orders/pdf/e: Generates an HTML file listing all orders grouped by karigar with generic names resolved via mapping.
Creates an HTML file (PDF-ready) showing orders for a single karigar with design and generic name info.
frontend/src/features/karigar-mapping/ka: Encodes and decodes karigar mapping data to and from blob storage, recomputing normalized design codes for compatibility.
frontend/src/features/karigar-mapping/Ka: UI for uploading, validating, parsing, and saving karigar mapping workbooks with user feedback and progress.
frontend/src/features/karigar-mapping/us: Reads a mapping blob and returns summary info such as total entries and sheet names via a React query hook.
frontend/src/features/order-list/compone: Displays orders grouped by karigar with selection checkboxes and provides per-karigar Excel export functionality.
Renders a simple table of enriched orders with selection controls.
frontend/src/features/order-list/OrderLi: Fetches daily orders, enriches them with karigar mapping, groups them, computes diagnostics, and renders the main order list tab logic.
frontend/src/features/order-list/useKari: Decodes the karigar mapping blob, normalizes design keys, and exposes a lookup map with decode status.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, auto-refreshing dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithStatus.ts: Wraps useActor to expose readiness flags and a basic refetch helper.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handles login, logout, stored identities, and AuthClient lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for fetching and mutating orders, assignments, and related backend operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and defines OKLCH color variables plus light/dark theme tokens and base element styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider and loads global CSS.
frontend/src/types/jspdf.d.ts: Empty type declaration file reserved for jsPDF typings.
frontend/src/types/xlsx.d.ts: Extends global Window with XLSX typings for reading, converting, and writing Excel files.
frontend/src/utils/buildInfo.ts: Provides helpers to read and format the build timestamp injected by Vite.
frontend/src/utils/textNormalize.ts: Contains utilities to normalize cell values, headers, and design codes for consistent Excel parsing and matching.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Implements helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/userFacingError.ts: Converts internal errors into user-friendly messages and adds optional retry prompts.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with theme extensions, OKLCH color variables, typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes current app requirements, architecture notes, known issues, and project state metadata.
